author: plynch
msg: o removing the dependencies still seems to let the plugin work, so thought I'd clean it up

author: plynch
msg: o we need to use ant conditions for some things. when running maven console ant properties are cached. So added code to remove them from the context before executing the ant conditions. This way maven console seems to always start fresh. Except of course for filtersets. I don't know how to remove filtersets from the context.

author: plynch
msg: o resolve issue  MAVEN-418 indexOf() != equals()
A namespace URI that was part of the string of another namespace uri was treated as equal to that larger uri string.

author: plynch
msg: o making changes that consist of new features and a better interface of goals for version 2.0
o adding full use of reinstall and restart goals
o nooping most goals if their action would be redundant

o adding webserver:cycle to attempt a smart figuring of what a typical developer would need for rapid development. This replaces the smarts found in webserver:install and webserver:start in versions 1.x

author: plynch
msg: o adjusting my role to let people know who has been the main driver of the project in case they have questions I can help with
